en_US.description: This mod imports some Icewind Dale elements into the Baldur's Gate game series, including around 70 profane and divine spells, bard songs, two-handed axes... Note that this mod is useless if you decide to install Sword Coast Stratagems.

components.141: Do Not Add High Quality Items
components.50: Bard Class Update: Add IWD Bard Songs
components.180: Bard Class Update: Selectable Bard Songs for Jesters and Skalds
components.150: Bard Class Update: Use IWD Spell Progression
components.70: Druid Class Update: Use IWD Shapeshifting and Ability Progression
components.71: Druid Class Update: Allow Elves to be Druids
components.100: Paladin Class Update: IWD Abilities and Skills
components.160: Paladin Class Update: Use IWD Spell Progression
components.110: Change Tracking for all rangers and ranger kits
components.111: Change Tracking only for non-kitted rangers
components.170: Ranger Class Update: Use IWD Spell Progression
components.120: Add evasion to thieves and all thief kits
components.121: Add evasion only to non-kitted thieves

fr_FR.description:
Ce mod importe certains éléments de Icewind Dale dans la série de jeux Baldur's Gate, dont environ 70 sortilèges profanes et divins, les chanson du barde, les haches à deux mains... N'hésitez pas à lire son readme pour plus de détails.
Notez que ce mod est inutile si vous décidez d'installer Sword Coast Stratagems.

components.141: Do Not Add High Quality Items
components.50: Bard Class Update: Add IWD Bard Songs
components.180: Bard Class Update: Selectable Bard Songs for Jesters and Skalds
components.150: Bard Class Update: Use IWD Spell Progression
components.70: Druid Class Update: Use IWD Shapeshifting and Ability Progression
components.71: Druid Class Update: Allow Elves to be Druids
components.100: Paladin Class Update: IWD Abilities and Skills
components.160: Paladin Class Update: Use IWD Spell Progression
components.110: Change Tracking for all rangers and ranger kits
components.111: Change Tracking only for non-kitted rangers
components.170: Ranger Class Update: Use IWD Spell Progression
components.120: Add evasion to thieves and all thief kits
components.121: Add evasion only to non-kitted thieves

zh_CN.description:
此模组将《冰风谷》中的某些元素导入到《博德之门》系列游戏中，包括大约70个世俗和神圣的法术、吟游诗人的歌曲、双手斧等。请务必阅读其readme文件以获取更多详细信息。
请注意，如果您决定安装Sword Coast Stratagems，则此模组是多余的。
